full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS DPAL PHYAG NA RDO RJE DRAG PO GSUM DRIL GYI GTOR CHOG BSANG GSER SKYEMS DANG BCAS PA 'DOD DGU'I MCHOD SBYIN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES BCOM LDAN 'DAS DPAL @008B PHYAG NA RDO RJE DRAG PO GSUM DRIL GYI GTOR CHOG BSANG GSER SKYEMS DANG BCAS PA 'DOD DGU'I MCHOD SBYIN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, CHOS SRID LA 'DREN BYED YANGS PA MCHOD DPON DGE SLONG BSHES GNYEN 'OD ZER GYIS, LHA RDZAS DANG, CEN KHRU BCAS PAS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ^SNGAGS 'CHANG RGAN PO BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSOS KHAL KHA SE CHEN JUN WANG GI SHOG TZE'UN TSO RA'I GUR SGAR DU SBYAR BA'O, ,TSUL 'DI KHAL KHA SE CHEN RGYAL KHAG GI ,BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG CHEN PO T'A CAN JUN, ,SE CHEN JUN WANG TSE RING BSAM GRUB DANG, ,GA-YUNG DRUNG RDO RJE YID BZHIN 'KHOR LO BCAS, ,MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR TE DPAR DU BSGRUBS PA'I DGES, ,SKYE BA'I PHRENG BAR DAL 'BYOR RTEN BZANG THOB ,DRIN CAN BLA MA MCHOG DANG MI 'BRAL ZHING, ,SA LAM YON TAN YONGS SU MTHAR PHYIN SHOG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO,
